scripts.start: ELEVENTY_GIT_SHA='dev mode' eleventy --serve --watch & tailwindcss -i src/styles/tailwind.css -c src/styles/tailwind.config.js -o dist/style.css --watch
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy && NODE_ENV=production tailwindcss -i src/styles/tailwind.css -c src/styles/tailwind.config.js -o dist/style.css --minify
